content:
Based on all sections I've provided already (Abstract, Introduction, Methods, Experimental Results, Discussion and Conclusions), write an academic review of the CVPR submissions.

Structure the review in the following structure:
- short summary
- strengths
- weaknesses
- typos
- score = {score} (1-10, where: 1-3 strong reject, 4-5: weak reject/borderline, 6-7: weak accept, 8-10: strong accept) Justify your score.
- reviewer confidence = {score} (1-10, where 1: I have very low confidence in my review as I'm not an expert in the field, 10: absolute certain in my evaluation) Justify your score.

(please structure the review in markdown sections)
